com.geolud.atomica.objects

Class GameSituation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geolud.atomica.objects.GameSituation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class GameSituation
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class holds information about a certain game situation, like the arrangement of tokens on the board. It is used for displaying the situation on the UI as well as for calculations.
    Author:
    Georg Ludewig
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameSituation

        public GameSituation(GameSettings gameSettings)
        Creates an game situation considering the given settings. Initializes all fields where the board size is defined in the given settings.
        Parameters:
        gameSettings - the settings to initialize the game with
